name: Verify Ladder Transition
description: Validates that ladder interaction correctly transitions the player to the ship area.
testObjective: Ensure ladder transition mechanism works smoothly and loads the correct destination.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Player is in the lobby room

steps.action: Approach the ladder embedded in the wall
steps.expected: Ladder shows green rectangular outline indicating it's interactable

steps.action: Press E to interact with the ladder
steps.expected: Screen transitions and player is loaded into the ship area
Player is positioned in the ship facing the correct direction

steps.action: Verify no loading errors or visual glitches occurred

postconditions: Player successfully transitioned to ship area
No errors or visual bugs during transition
